overviewContent: Azure regions and availability zones are designed to help you achieve resiliency and reliability for your business-critical workloads. Azure maintains multiple geographies. These discrete demarcations define disaster recovery and data residency boundaries across one or multiple Azure regions. Maintaining many regions ensures customers are supported across the world.

Basic.title: Basic - without outbound traffic
Basic.subTitle: Best for customers looking to get started with high availability.

loadBalancer.pointOne: Enabled by default for Level 4 load balancing

Intermediate.title: Intermediate - with outbound traffic
Intermediate.subTitle: Best for customers with workloads supporting up to 1,000 concurrent users.

Advanced.title: Advanced - with outbound traffic
Advanced.subTitle: Best for customers with production workloads.
